actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend Sec. 8335(e) of title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Exempts managerial and clerical employees of the Alaska Railroad from provisions automatically separating from service employees of such railroad who become 62 years of age and complete 15 years of service.

titles.title: A bill to amend Sec. 8335(e) of title 5, United States Code.
